p.head: CHAPTER 122

MIDNIGHT ALOFT.—THUNDER AND LIGHTNING.
The Main-top-sail yard.—Tashtego passing new lashings around it.
p.note: Tashtego passing new lashings around it: Tashtego is executing Ahab’s order in Ch. 120, lashing the main-top-sail-yard to the mast to prevent its falling.

div.p: “Um, um, um. Stop that thunder! Plenty too much thunder up here. What’s the use of thunder? Um, um, um. We don’t want thunder; we want rum; give us a glass of rum. Um, um, um!”
